Edwards, Santa Cruz Earn Final Big Ten Weekly Awards
items.summary: For the second time this season, two Purdue student-athletes have been named to Big Ten Weekly honors. Purdue’s Emily Edwards was named Goalkeeper of the Week, while Megan Santa Cruz was named Offensive Player of the Week.
